title: Definitions
context: [ARTICLE 22] LOSS MITIGATION GRANT PROGRAM ยง431:22-101 Definitions. As used in this article: &ldquo;Commissioner&rdquo; means the insurance commissioner. &ldquo;Loss mitigation&rdquo; means actions undertaken to reduce losses that may result from a hazard. &ldquo;Wind resistive devices&rdquo; means devices, techniques, and residential safe rooms, as identified and determined in accordance with section 431:22-104(b), that increase a building&rsquo;s or structure&rsquo;s resistance to damage from wind forces. [L 2002, c 179, pt of ยง3; am L Sp 2005, c 5, ยง9; am L 2007, c 80, ยง2]
